solution.text:
TSA of the arena= SA of 5 faces of a cuboid - 6[area of the base of the cone] + CSA of the cones
CSA of the cone is given by \(\pi \times r \times l\)
Cones are placed closely,\(\Rightarrow 8\times radius(r) = length\,of\,cuboid\Rightarrow r=_{{3*j}}_\)
\(=\sqrt {h^2+R^2}=\sqrt {_{{3*j}}_^2+_{{4*j}}_^2}=_{{5*j}}_\)
therefore area of a cones=\(8\times \pi \times _{{3*j}}_ \times _{{5*j}}_=_{{trunc(pi_val*j*j*15*8,2)}}_\)
Therefore area of 5 faces of a cuboid=\( 2\times (lh+bh) + lb\)
\(\Rightarrow _{{2*24*j*4*j+2*12*j*4*j+12*j*24*j}}_\)
area of the circles on the top face=\(8\times \pi \times r^2=_{{trunc(pi_val*j*j*9*8,2)}}_\)
TSA of the arena= SA of 5 faces of a cuboid - 8[area of the base of the cone] + CSA of the cones
\(\Rightarrow _{{2*24*j*4*j+2*12*j*4*j+12*j*24*j}}_ - _{{trunc(pi_val*j*j*9*8,2)}}_ + _{{trunc(pi_val*j*j*15*8,2)}}_\)
\(\Rightarrow _{{trunc(2*24*j*4*j+2*12*j*4*j+12*j*24*j-pi_val*j*j*9*8+pi_val*j*j*15*8,2)}}_\)

content.text:
A structure used by policemen to puncture the criminals cars is shown in the figure.
The dimensions of the cuboid are as follows: height(h) = _{{4*j}}_ , length(l) = _{{24*j}}_ , width(b)=_{{12*j}}_
Cones are placed close to each other it's height is equal to that of the cuboid
Find the surface area of the structure
